Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I have big problems with gears in my vechicle, And I don't know what can I do . I have Firespiter and KAX for actual version.

there is link to album with images https://imageshack.com/a/G8Wz/1

PS: I have x64 version

I would be more descriptive. What exact problem are you having? The photos show your craft tipping over but..not much else. As an aside, I am also having a problem with the side friction force of my wheels using firespitter.
I realize that this a gameplay issue rather than a crash issue, so the sticky isn't super-relevant, but do please at least list your mods (AND THEIR VERSIONS) and reproduction steps.
